data.actual_result: It lets you put a space, and cuts off the colon
data.expected_result: It's supposed to either not let you put a space, or not count in the emoji
data.short_description: When you add a space to the end of an emoji name when creating one, the colon (:emoji:) moves to the bottom.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the emojis menu in server settings - put an image - set a name and put a space at the end of it - the colon for the emoji name is gone to the bottom
